trace_id.description: Unique identifier for a trace, spanning multiple commands.

span_id.description: Unique identifier for a single command execution (a span in the trace).

parent_id.description: The span_id of the parent command, if any.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the event in ISO 8601 format.

command.description: The name of the command being executed.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who initiated the command.

input.description: The input arguments and keyword arguments for the command.

metadata.description: Any additional metadata about the command or its environment.
